question: Alright, I have been undiagnosed hypoglycemic for 4 years since I miscarried and then quit drinking after 4 years of alchoholism.  Every three months or so my sugar would drop, I would eat candy ok.  Last september I started not sleeping well and my eyes started to worsen (blind in one already), I did fine for a while till I stopped drinking popl 4 months ago.  Then I couldnt sleep at all, I had to use the bathroom like every five minutes, I was always tired.  And my eyes still got worse.  Well yesterday I had a spell it started as usual but it got way worse.  I was .05 short of getting a chocolate bar when my sugar started to drop and all I had with me was an apple.  At first I had to pee alot and was very thirsty ( I have been extremely moody since september), my eyes started to do these like twitchy flipps in my head and I couldnt see straight, I got really really tired and could barely keep my eyes open, started shaking, vomited 2x, my entire body shook and my legs and mouth felt like they didnt want to work right.  I steadied my apple out just to make it through the work day then ran down to the gas station and loaded up on chocolate and pop.  However when I was in the car after I bought it I had like a mini seizure thing, my eyes started going crazy and I couldnt hardly hold on to the chocolate.  I managed to get a little down and finally calmed but it was so scary.  I am 21 and diabetes runs in my family.  Until yesteday I thought I could control these sugar lows.Today one of the guys from work is diabetic and pricked my finger.  I came out at 113 I have been eating more chocolate and drinking soda all day though.  I dont know anything about this, does this mean IM ok?  I just got hired on and wont get my insurance card for 2 more weeks and dont have the money out of pocket to visit the doctor till then.  PLEASE HELP IM SO SCARED!
title: Do I have diabetes?  Should I be tested?
